meanings.definition: A salt or ester of propionic acid.
meanings.sent1: I added propionate to the solution to see if it would change color.
meanings.sent2: The propionate in the cheese gave it a tangy flavor.
meanings.sent3: The propionate and the vinegar had a dance-off in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like propionate, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The propionate sparkled under the microscope, revealing its true nature.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the propionate group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the propionate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Propionate is commonly found in various food products.
meanings.sent3: The propionate group decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: His words were like propionate, bonding people together.
meanings.sent5: The propionate group stood out in the chemical reaction, showing its importance.
